meaning: She is the cause of tejas (illumination) that exists with the individual as well as in the Sun.
commentary: The Sun has unending illumination –Aditya-gatam tejaha. She is the illumination (tejas) within the Sun and thus is the cause of its illumination. Tejovati or Vahnipuri is the city where the Fire God (Agni) resides. As She is that city itself, She takes on the name Tejovati.
